source_text: 1.05% Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty over E28/2528, E28/2595, and E28/2529
additional_details: The royalty is part of the acquisition terms for Rumble Resources Limited to acquire the outstanding 70% of the Thunderstorm Gold Project from IGO Limited. This implies Rumble Resources Limited will pay the royalty to IGO Limited. The royalty applies to specific exploration tenements: E28/2528, E28/2595, and E28/2529.
